title: ebeAdd and ebeSubtract should support matrix operations
description: Currently ebeAdd and ebeSubtract perform element-by-element addition and subtraction of vectors. This ticket will allow them to perform element-by-element addition and subtraction of matrices as well.

comments.content:
Commit dc5db9b2f1050f1d1fc545c33f117ae4ec867983 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Joel Bernstein
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=dc5db9b ]

SOLR-12054: ebeAdd and ebeSubtract should support matrix operations
